resources.string: E-Rhythms
Settings

Consent for Participation in Interview Research


 I volunteer to participate in a research project conducted by Dr. [Name of the Principle Investigator] from Century University . I understand that the project is designed to gather information about academic work of faculty on campus. I will be one of approximately 30 people being interviewed for this research.

1. My participation in this project is voluntary. I understand that I will not be paid for my participation. I may withdraw and discontinue participation at any time without penalty. If I decline to participate or withdraw from the study, no one on my campus will be told.
I Agree
I Disagree
Sorry, you are not eligible for this research. E-Rhythms will close now.
Please enter your Participant ID to continue. (You may retrieve it from the researchers)
Build 1550
Activate your account
OK
Welcome to E-Rhythms!

INSTRUCTIONS

In the interview, you'll be shown a series of text or questions that has been previously decided by your researcher.

Your responses will be made available to the researcher at the end of the survery.

We DO NOT gather any personal identifiable data.

INSTRUCTIONS

In the interview, you'll be shown a series of information or questions that has been previously decided by your researcher. Notice that we DO NOT gather any personal identifiable data during the survey or interview. 

Press OK/Next button to continue.

 [ALPHATEST_ONLY]This dialog box will soon be replaced with a hovering tutorial texts on the screen, guiding users to use the navigation button and swipe gesture(coming soon) to navigate. Please tell us what do you think.

This app was developed through the E-Rthyms Project. E-Rhythms are the Everyday and Eclectic Rhythms of Electronically mediated social interaction. They are the patterns of phone calls, text messages, social media posts, and emails that connect friends, family, and colleagues. They are the fabric of contemporary social life, they help us get by and get ahead, and their complexity necessitates the development of new studies and software.

About the project: http://erhythms.utm.utoronto.ca/site/index.php?r=site/page&view=about
Do you want to exit and remove all survey and log data? (This will ensure that any data stored on the server from your phone is completely removed.)
Thank you for your interest. You are now opt-out of our research, and all your data has been removed. You may now press OK to exit.
Thank you for your participation. \nYou may now press OK to exit.

Sorry, you are not eligible to participate in this research. \nYou may now press \"OK\" to exit. Thank you for your interest.
Note: You can\'t change response for this question because it has branching questions.
